resources.string: When making this app I had convenience and ease of use in mind. New York City is all about convenience, from the moment you open this app I wanted the user to be met with all viable and up to the minute information about the MTA subway system.\n As a student, who also works and travels frequently throughout all five boroughs of the city, I felt there was something missing in the current offering of transit apps that cater to the city; convenience, information, and ease of use.
